商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: Zz 天藍色
留言內容: Just wore it for the first time today.  When I first got it, it felt weird and was kind of scratchy.  I washed it and put it in the dryer.  It did shrink a bit, but I like the fit better and while the arms became just a bit short, it doesn't bother me as I cuff them anyway.  But the great part is that it came out soft and comfy.  It's like having a brand new favorite old shirt.  Its something I will be able to wear year round.  The colors are nice and there was no fade when I washed it.  I usually wear large, but bought XL because I figured it would shrink.  If I had wanted it more of an oversized shirt, I would have bought 2XL hope that's helpful sizewise.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: U 紫色
留言內容: I’ll try to add a picture later. I’m 5 foot 3, about 145 pounds. I bought the Medium. It fits really well, Super flattering. I have just purchased a couple more in different colors (blue and white) it is the perfect shirt for work. I sit and talk with people most of the day. Due to the shape of the shirt, I never have to worry if I am “hanging out” or if my mummy tummy (of 4) is sticking out… it just looks nice, does not seems to wrinkle at all. I wash mine on cold and immediately hang to dry and have not needed to iron. I only took one star off because I had hoped the fabric would be a tad softer. Linen can be nice, but this one is a tad rough- not horrible. It’s fine I wear it with a tank underneath and without- so it’s fine, but it’s not silky or cotton. The color was vibrant, lovely- I tucked just the front into my jeans and it gives a great look. Highly recommend this shirt.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: B 天藍色
留言內容: I wanted a linen shirt, but linen clothing will wrinkle if you look at them funny.  I was hesitant to buy this because I worry about buying clothing online before I get a chance to try them on beforehand.This shirt is fantastic.  It has that linen look, without the high maintenance of linen.  I like that I can dress it up with a blazer, or without for a more casual look.  It straddles both look seamlessly.  I've taken this shirt on vacation where I had to wear it without the benefit of ironing it, and it looks fine.  The polyester keeps it from wrinkling too much.The only negatives are the sleeve lengths and the length of the shirt.  I'm not a tall, nor big person.  The size small fits me perfectly, but the sleeves can use an extra inch.  The hem length can use about 2 more inches so that it doesn't untuck so easily.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: U 淺卡其色
留言內容: To small. I order a Med. And is to small and material is to raft and will make you itch..I will not buy it  again

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: Ua Stripe
留言內容: I love this blouse. I purchased the white with stripes. The fit is loose without looking too boxy and true to size. The fabric is soft, light and flowy, and super comfortable. Tucked in or loose, open front or layered over another shirt, it looks trendy and cute. I personally didn’t like it layered under a sweater but that’s just not my style.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: U 藍色
留言內容: I read reviews that said to size up, shrinkage being an issue even with hand washing and hanging to dry. So I bought an x-tra large. And it was too big even after washing it in the machine on warm and drying on low. Next I bought a large, but it was still too big. I ended up buying a medium, machine washed it on cold and dried it in the dryer on low. No shrinking!  I’m pretty sensitive to fabrics, clothing tags, etc.  I thought they were actually quite soft. So I would say these run true to size, are quite soft and tolerated machine washing on cold and drying on low in the dryer without shrinking. I wil be purchasing more colors.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 白色
留言內容: This shirt did not fit as described by the reviews or the size guide. I ordered the white shirt and the color was not consistent at all. The sleeves were more of an off white. The quality of the shirt was awful. I very much wanted to like this shirt, I had been waiting for it to go on sale and I bought it as soon as it did. Overall it was a miss.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: U 紫色
留言內容: I usually wear an xl, so that's what I got. To achieve the loose/oversized look, you'll need to upsize. Nice material and beautiful purple color. I will be returning for the bigger size as I want a looser fit.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 白色
留言內容: I do like this shirt...it is a bit thin and does run small. I can usually wear a medium, but I ordered a large and it is still tight. Like a lot of Chinese made clothing the sizing is often off.  Otherwise a good value for what it is.

SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 白色

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 白色
留言內容: I’m usually a small in shirts, especially baggy. So I sized up to a medium considering other reviews. Wish I had gone up to a large for the oversized baggy fit.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: 白色
留言內容: I was looking for an oversized linen like shirt to go over swimwear and tops in very hot weather.  It is an odd cut and it is very short.  I love white.  This came tea/cream.  I did boil it in Rit Color remover and it came closer to white.  I would have liked it more if it were more sheer.  The biggest problem is that I ordered it very large (two sizes too big) so that it would be longer and more of a coverup instead of a shirt.  The shirt was blousy but it was very short.  I made it work but it is not my favorite.  Meh..

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 黑色
留言內容: I bought this in the orange-red and the black. The orange-red is just red, so it’s not like the image shown. The black is fine. I washed it on the wrinkle reducer setting and it looks great. Sad about the other shirt as that’s the one I was excited about.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: U 淺綠色
留言內容: This is a beautiful shirt.. BUT it shirks a lot! Washed on cold, dried in low as specified but this shrank so much that I can’t even button it. I wear a M or L depending on style. Went with a large because I wanted it over sized, which it was before washing.  So either don’t put in dryer or go 2 sizes bigger if you want it to fit

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: 白色
留言內容: What a nice shirt. It washed beautifully and I even put it in dryer which directions say don’t. But it came out fabulous and does not need to be ironed after dryer.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: B 天藍色
留言內容: Although the title of this item reads "Linen", it most definitely is not.  That is, upon close examination, actually spelled out in the description on the Amazon ad.Although the photo shows the blouse as being a perky sky blue, it's actually a very very pale blue .. with a grey tinge and very light colored.  Definitely not a brilliant uplifting sky blue as I'd hoped.It drapes nicely (I'm 5'1" and 150lb)  washes well (cold water, hang to dry) and irons easily.  It's comfy to wear and I DO like it and will keep it, but sadly, it's not what I signed up for.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 白色
留言內容: I was expecting a bright white as shown in the images. Mine came in an off white or beige color. (Almost yellow)

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: B 天藍色
留言內容: This is the second one of these shirts I’ve purchased this time it was the light blue size x-large for reference I’ve 5”8 223 pounds and the size is perfect. Nice quality material with just a little stretch. I probably will purchase another one! I would definitely recommend.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: Ua Floral 天藍色
留言內容: This is a nice enough shirt, was flattering in it's design.  However the construction was wanting.  Threads were unclipped and worst of all buttons were missing.  If you are looking for a white shirt as it is listed in the description, this is not the white shirt you expect.  It's more off white or ivory, colors I don't do well in, so with all that back it went.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 灰色
留言內容: I never write reviews, but this shirt deserves one. I was a little worried about ordering this shirt because of the "often returned" warning on it, but I'm so glad I did! It's one of my favorite shirts now! I absolutely love the linen look.I ordered the gray, which is more like a light tan in real life (I tried to edit the picture to be as close as possible to its actual color - it's a little less orangey in real life, but it's pretty close). I got the medium (bust 35, waist 33) and it's the perfect size for me.Some of the reviews said the material is scratchy, and it is a bit, but it's not a problem for me. I could see how it would bother people with more sensitive skin though. I washed it on cold and laid it flat to dry and didn't experience any shrinkage at all. There is some slight wrinkling and a little bit of pilling, but those are minor things.Overall, this is a great shirt! I would definitely consider getting it in a different color later on:)

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: B 天藍色
留言內容: Nice comfortable fit great for over tanks.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: 白色
留言內容: The fabric of the white shirt is very soft and comfortable.I am 5"7", 110 ish, 34A.I got the shirt in Small.I am disappointed that you can see my white bra through it.I wore it this past week with a black tank under it, which looked fine and coordinated with black pants.Maybe an ecru bra would not show, but I still wish it were a bit less sheer.Overall, I do like this shirt, though.It is versatile.Leave a couple of buttons at the top and bottom undone and tie the ends together.Button most or all the buttons and tuck in part or all of the shirt - or leave it untucked like I did.Leave all the buttons undone and leave the shirt open with a tank or T under it.It really is nice fabric, and these shirts can be worn for many occasions.Use pants/skirt, shoes, belt and other accessories to change the look for more formal or casual events.I do recommend these shirts and am glad I got this.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: 白色
留言內容: I love this shirt!!! It is a great material and isn’t stiff. It hangs off my body really well and is just a great staple piece. True to size and would 110% recommend

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: Ua Floral 天藍色
留言內容: I wanted to like this shirt. I’m a small but ordered a medium so it would be oversized. It was tight in shoulders & upper arm. There is a strange seam going across the middle back.  It’s a button down not a v-neck and there are no buttons for rolled sleeves.  For a ‘linen’ shirt, it’s actually polyester.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: Ua Floral 天藍色
留言內容: I love the shirt and the quality but this ran very small. I would go up two sizes.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: U 橘紅色
留言內容: I ordered the burnt orange color, it is red with a hint of orange. Definitely not what was pictured in the description

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 白色
留言內容: This was perfect the day I got it. I got a size up (L) because I wanted a more casual feel. One wash/dry and it’s virtually a small, with the sleeves now falling between my elbow and wrist, and the bottom hits me at my waist. Not hips, waist.So, I bought a second one and went two sizes up (XL). Washed it on cold, hung it to dry, and it still shrunk. This one now fits like a medium, which is still not what I wanted either.Third time was the charm. I  found the perfect size in an XXL! Keep in mind, I’m an everyday M, 5’6, 135 lbs, 34C.  I immediately washed & dried it and it’s absolutely perfect— I finally have the perfect linen shirt and look. I will definitely purchase more colors.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: U 深藍色
留言內容: I liked the shirt, the quality of the material is great. The first time I wore the blouse it was a little scratchy.  You should order a size up. Based on the reviews, I ordered the XL. I'm 5 feet 2 and 159 pounds and I normally wear a large, this fit me perfectly. My only issue is I washed the shirt and put it in the dryer (big mistake). It shrank, not so much that I can't wear it; but, it shrank enough to be noticeable to me. All in all, I will order another one, I just want put it in the dryer.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 灰色
留言內容: being that this was a gift for a friend, she did say that she loves the fabric and it fits her style......

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: Ua Floral 天藍色
留言內容: I’m disappointed that I didn’t receive the blue flora blouse that I ordered; I was sent red. The material is okay.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: Zz 綠色
留言內容: I love this shirt blouse, I don't like long sleeve shirt I cut the sleeve but I love how thin and airy it is, one of my fave blouse to wear when going out.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: Ua Stripe
留言內容: I got this in the striped and the light blue in a size Large (I’m usually between M-L depending on brand and fit) because I wanted it to be more loose, not fitted. I love the striped one! Fits great, hangs nicely on the body, is a nice light soft flowy material, and the colors are exactly what I expected. However, the blue one is a different material. I could tell as soon as I picked it up that it felt thicker and heavier and…stiffer? I can’t even tell you how well it fit, because as soon as I put it on I could feel myself getting all itchy and had to immediately take it back off. Take that with a grain of salt, as I have very sensitive skin and am very picky about the feel of my clothes (unfortunately can’t wear anything with even 1% wool, for example). So I’m not saying it’s an itchy material, just that the material seems to vary greatly from one color to another.

留言內容: I ordered my normal size , large. Perfect size for me. Not oversized but roomy enough to give me my side tuck I wanted. Based on other reviews I will not put in dryer. Great buy !

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: Ua Floral 天藍色
留言內容: Great shirt. Lightweight summer blouse. True to size. Great with jeans. Can be dressed up or be super casual.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 白色
留言內容: I picked this when I searched for linen shirts.  Don’t get me wrong..The shirt I received is very nice..looks like linen, almost feels like linen but definitely not linen.  I read the description and to my surprise it’s a mix of polyester and spandex, not the natural fabric that I wanted and needed. I take fault in this but it is misleading when you search linen shirts. It should read “Like Linen”

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: Ua Stripe
留言內容: So this is my third shirt from this company. I have had no issued at all with quality. I have a white shirt, a black shirt and now the stripped one. They all fit the same and are great for dressing up or down. I like the linen feel of them.  My only gripe with the stripped shirt is the color. It might be my computer but I felt the background of the shirt was more of a very light gray and when the shirt arrived it was white with the stripes. But the colors of the stripes were spot on and honestly it's  cute. so that is why I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars. Other than that, very happy

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 白色
留言內容: I got this shirt for a cover up to wear on the motorcycle on hot sunny days: the material is a little on the thicker side without much stretch, just a little snugger than I would like on my upper arms, but that’s a problem I often have since my previously muscular arms are getting chubbier with age. Feels and looks like a very good quality shirt, not see thru, but you would want a nude bra or cami under it I think. The color is a creamy white/ivory with linen-look detailing in the fabric. Length is on the longer side for me, but I’m only 5’2” so most things are: comes just past my butt. Blouse is cut nicely, but not a slim fit, so works well with my extra 10 pounds. I have not washed it yet, tag states to hand wash & not to dry, so I will try that and will update post if it shrinks or becomes really wrinkly as some blouses do when you can’t dry them. For reference, I bought a medium and it seems to be true to size, comparable to a 6-8.UPDATE:  I recently bought a second one of these shirts in the dark blue and the only con was that the buttons did not match the shirt: they were white, which I wasn’t real crazy about, but will keep as a casual shirt. I have washed these on delicate/hand wash cycle, fluffed on air dry with 2 fabric softener sheets, and hung to dry the rest of the way. They did not seem to shrink and any additional wrinkles I steamed out.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: U 卡其色
留言內容: I like this shirt. It's loose enough but not baggy, the color is as expected and it packs nicely for travel. The material was very icky when taking it out of the package but after washing (which I do before wearing) it softened a bit and looks much better. I have a feeling it'll soften over time. It's not linen but does mimick it - even unwashed, undried linen feels stiff and uncomfortable - which is nice since linen can be expensive. The fit is pretty accurate - I'm 5"9, 150lbs with larger breasts and it lays nicely. Only issue, I tend to ignore the dry clean idea when it comes to clothing purchased on Amazon but definitely heed that warning - I dried in delicate and the sleeves shrunk by several inches. Not a big deal to me as I roll the sleeves up the majority of the time but it was shocking how much they shrunk. Still, that was my error and not the manufacturer.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: U 卡其色
留言內容: I love the way this shirt fits.  I normally wear shirts that are large-XL, depending on the style, but I ordered a 2XL in this "Astylish Womens V Neck Roll up Sleeve Button Down Blouse" in Khaki.  Usually khaki and tan colors are hit and miss for me, but this is a nice, warm khaki that really compliments natural hair and skin color.  The shirt is well fitted though the shoulders and chest, with just enough room for my chubby upper arms to be comfortable and move freely while I move around and lift my arms. The shirt is perfect length for me, but some people with a long torso may find it a little short. The sleeve length is fine for me, but barely; they border on too short. I got this shirt to be worn tucked in with slacks to the office and it looks fantastic.  The fabric IS itchy and stiff upon arrival, but a cold wash on gentle cycle and hang to dry helped improve the texture.  It will never feel like a soft cotton shirt, it will always feel more like a medium thickness linen, even though it isn't linen. Wrinkles seem to fall out easily when hung in the bathroom, a big improvement over real linen or even linen blends I have had in the past.  I heeded the advice of other reviewers and have never put this in the dryer or washed on warm, but I'm also not willing to dry clean it all the time.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: U 淺棕色
留言內容: This is a really nice blouse, until you wash it.  It did hang beautifully, and comfortably when on.  The brown was slightly see thru, but could be worn alone.  It had a nice loose fit.  But not baggy.  Just right.  My biggest complaint is how much it shrunk when washed.  I washed it by hand in cold water and hung it up to air dry.It shrunk about 1/2 a size and is now a bit clingy to the body.  And just a little scratchy now.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 黑色
留言內容: I'm 5'6" and 145lbs.  I first got Large but sent them back before washing. Got 6 colors in XL, and they fit good after hand washing and drip-drying.  I don't want clingy tight.  I like it to blouse at the waist.  I also like that there's just enough stretch to push the sleeves up without having to unbutton the cuffs.  The light blue color isn't as bright a blue as I was expecting, more of a light denim hue.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: Zz 粉紅色
留言內容: I was immediately impressed with the straight, even stitching and the fact that both arms, shoulders, and length were symmetrical, everywhere. It feels slightly scratchy at first try-on, but I’m sure it just needs a washing with a bit of fabric softener. I bought the multi-colored peach/cream/ brown and now that I’ve seen and touched the fabric I’ll be buying another in solid cream. I tend to wear a wireless soft bra, rather than a constructed bra, so light-colored fabrics are sometimes a “no.” This one is a “yes.”True to size, the Large fits a 40 to 41” bust (I’m small across the back, that could possibly cause tightness if you have a larger back) and the arms are the correct length for my 5’4”, 134 lbs body.I wouldn’t send this through the dryer (shrinkage alert) except for a low-heat quick trip to remove any wrinkles left over from washing.PS if between sizes on the chart listed for this brand, I’d size up. I’ll likely try the XL for my next purchase to be able to toss in the dryer on delicate with no worries.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 白色
留言內容: Soft material nice and flowing.  Bought XL which worked great as an oversized blouse then mistakenly dried it. Now it’s perfect as a regular blouse.  Will buy more!

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: Ua Floral 天藍色
留言內容: I love the blue on white print but I’m not impressed with the way it washes up. I have other styles that are easier care. It’s “okay” but not a favorite.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 白色
留言內容: Pleasantly surprised by the subtle texture of this shirt. It’s quite flattering. It is the tiniest bit sheer, but I remain delighted with this purchase.

商品名稱: Astylish 女款 V 領捲袖鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: U 橘色
留言內容: The fabric is lovely and the style is very nice. Expect it to shrink an entire size if using the dryer. This shirt is a very fitted style and sizing which is what I was going for.
